node.title: Sustainable Health Evangelism
node.description: We have an unprecedented opportunity to let our health message illuminate our world. Come learn how everyone, medical and non-medical, young and old, can keep the cycle of health evangelism going year-round. Listen to amazing stories of how blended message evangelism is impacting lives for eternity. Get the latest information on training and resources your church or ministry can use to follow Jesus’ method of winning souls for the kingdom.
